title: Get ready, Boston Typophiles: TypeCon is coming to town.
content:
[The Society of Typographic Aficionados](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181359/http:/www.typesociety.org/) (SOTA) will present its eighth annual conference in Beantown next summer. There will be a [TypeCon2006](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181359/http:/www.typecon.com/) planning meeting on Tuesday, October 11, 2005, in the Boston area (Woburn). Join us for a big brainstorm, and to make fun of how a Left Coaster pronounces Worcester and Gloucester.

MEETING DETAILS:  
**Tuesday, October 11, 2005 / 7 pm**

Monotype Imaging  
500 Unicorn Park Drive, Second Floor  
Woburn, MA 01801

[Google Marks the Spot!](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317181359/http:/maps.google.com/maps?q=500+Unicorn+Park+Drive,+Woburn,+MA+01801&spn=0.029224,0.060828&hl=en)

Exit 36 (Montvale Ave.) off Route 93  
Unicorn Park Drive is the first street east of Route 93  
500 Unicorn Park is the last building before the Marriott Hotel

_Refreshments will be served!_

Feel free to invite friends and colleagues in the Boston area who might be interested. Please email _info /at/ typesociety.org_ to chat about TypeCon2006, and to RSVP to the meeting (we need to know how many cookies to buy).

If you can't make it to this meeting, but would like to be involved, send an email.
author: tamye
